title.zh: 欢迎使用Twine游戏开发工具
title.en: Welcome to Twine Game Development Tool

feature: 可视化故事创作：通过简单的节点连接创建游戏故事
富文本编辑：支持文本格式化、图片、音频等多媒体内容
条件逻辑：设置变量和条件分支，创建复杂的游戏机制
CSS样式：自定义界面风格，打造独特的游戏外观
JavaScript扩展：通过脚本实现高级功能和特效
一键导出：快速生成可分享的HTML游戏文件
Visual Story Creation: Create game stories through simple node connections
Rich Text Editing: Support text formatting, images, audio and other multimedia
Conditional Logic: Set variables and branches for complex game mechanics
CSS Styling: Customize interface style for unique game appearance
JavaScript Extensions: Implement advanced features through scripting
One-click Export: Generate shareable HTML game files
